projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: My portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects. It features a completely unique design tailored to reflect my personality and creativity.

projects.name: Tattoo Slot Machine
projects.description: An interactive slot machine project aimed at generating revenue for Budapest based Mots Doux tattoo salon while showcasing a variety of frontend technologies and design skills. Guests can spin on-site and receive this extra tattoo as a gift. But you can also try it now! Spin the reels, discover unique tattoo designs, and taste the victory!
